Step1.pickup-location-description: Click on the map to select your desired pickup location
Step1.map-api-key-required: Map requires Google Maps API key

Step2.selectDates: Select your preferred rental dates from the calendar below
Step2.noteAvailableDate: This unit becomes available for booking starting {date}
Step2.noteUnavailableDate: Unavailable units are likely booked for your chosen dates
Step2.noteUnavailableSlots: Unavailable slots are likely booked for your chosen date
Step2.selectTimeSlotDescription: Select consecutive time slots for your booking. Available times are shown in white, booked times are disabled.
Step2.timeRangeNote: Please select the start and end time for your court booking
Step2.validationError: Failed to validate dates. Please try again.
Step2.weekdaysValidationError: Please select all 4 weekdays (Sunday to Wednesday)
Step2.holidaysValidationError: Please select all 3 holiday days (Thursday to Saturday)

Step2_5.no-tents: No tents available in this property
Step2_5.layout-note: Click on available tents to select them. Unavailable tents are likely booked for your chosen dates.
Step2_5.name: Name
Step2_5.camp-note: Note: This is the camp's layout. The tents you select will match the same numbers and locations shown here
Step2_5.details-note: Note: You can check all tent details inside the camp details section
Step2_5.select-rooms-description: Now you can choose the room types you need and how many of each!
Step2_5.no-apartments-available: No apartments available for the selected rent type

Step4.securityDepositNote: Any security deposit will be held by Dyarko as a guarantee and refunded after your rental ends, per Terms & Conditions.
Step4.commissionNote: Any commission on your invoice comes from the agent or broker — not from Dyarko.

CreateAd.title: Create ADS
CreateAd.subtitle: Post your needs and let agents help you to find the right property
CreateAd.intro-title: It's easy to get Property on Dyarko
CreateAd.intro-step1-description: Fill in the fields and specify your exact property requirements.
CreateAd.intro-step2-description: Complete the payment for your listing, and it will be visible to all our agents on the Dyarko platform.
CreateAd.intro-step3-description: Track your request and wait for responses from our agents with properties that match your needs.
CreateAd.description-max: Description must be 500 characters or less
